main event: An object observed moving up and down into the clouds in San Bernardino, California on July 15, 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared cup-shaped and was silvery and gold in color., The sighting occurred during a full moon which was in a similar position to the observed object., The object briefly showed through the clouds., It moved down from the clouds, slowed down, and then moved back up., The observation lasted only a minute and was reported through Air Visual.
sighted object: a cup-shaped silvery and gold object
witness description: Civilian observation recorded by Project Blue Book
